vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
νεό-φῠτος, ον,
newly planted, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; κτῆμα [Refs 3rd c.AD+] young plants, [LXX+1st c.AD+]; νεώ- Papyrus), etc.
__II metaphorically, new convert, neophyte, [NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: newly converted, a figurative extension of a new plant, not found in the NT novice
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
newly converted, a figurative extension of a new plant, not found in the NT novice
newly, or recently planted metaphorically a neophyte, one newly implanted into the Christian Church, a new convert, 1Tim. 3:6*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 剛栽種引進的
1a) 新皈依者, 新信徒 (初信的基督徒) (提前 3:6)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 刚栽种引进的
1a) 新皈依者, 新信徒 (初信的基督徒) (提前 3:6)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: tân tín đồ; tân đảng viên; một người mới tin. (nghĩa đen: mới trồng), Cơ đốc nhân mới quy đạo, mới cải đạo gần đây.
